titles.title: A bill to convey the District of Columbia Employment Security Building to the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Labor to convey to the District of Columbia without monetary consideration all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the District of Columbia Employment Security Building and the land on which it stands.
